attributes.action: Make sure All Girls have access to sanitary products at school.
attributes.additional_details: Families in poverty are often having to go to Food Banks. Daughters/ Mums should not have to be in the position where they have to ask for sanitary products
attributes.background: Many girls from poorer families struggle to pay for sanitary items. If schools provided them it would lift a burden from the impoverished families in the U.K.
